info.gloss: to finish; particle of completed action

words: indicates a completed or finished action
besides; except for; aside from; in addition to
in order to; for the sake of; for the purpose of
extremely; very; terribly; my god! (expression of surprise)
at the worst; if worst comes to worst; serious, alarming
extraWords: "a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much); a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)"
be finished; be ready; all right; that's enough
to settle; to finish; to conclude; to wind up
to understand clearly; to be clear about; plain; clear
to understand sth thoroughly (like the back of one's hand)
direct and plain speaking (idiom); blunt; straightforward
